title: Is Pope Francis A Socialist? (Ep 1696)
description:
In this episode, I address the latest bizarre rant by Pope Francis against economic freedom and liberty. I also address this disturbing video from the Trucker rally in Canada. 

News Picks:


Was Joe Rogan right about Ivermectin? 

Now the Pope is speaking out in favor of taxes?

Is the federal government gathering a list of gun owners? 


George Soros is back. 


What was google up to in China?
